title: War: The Greatest Reset | Guests: James O’Keefe & John Soriano | 1/24/22
description:
Glenn starts off the show with a monologue remembering the 1970s and how we’re still cleaning up the mess that was started back then. Glenn and Stu discuss the Russia-Ukraine controversy and the repercussions that could follow due to President Biden’s weakness. Glenn has on John Soriano, a former pharmaceutical executive who quit his job over a vaccine mandate, despite being triple-vaccinated. Project Veritas founder and CEO James O’Keefe joins to discuss his new book, “American Muckraker: Rethinking Journalism for the 21st Century.” Mainstream Democrats are waking up to the COVID scare and the negative effects it’s having on society, and Stu explains how this realization came to southern states over a year ago.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
